model: gpt-4

//user:

 I have used the Wikipedia API to extract some description for a page but the description is a bit long: 

``` 
Page name: Kevin O'Sullivan
Long description: Kevin O'Sullivan may refer to:

Kevin Jer O'Sullivan (born 1948), Irish Gaelic footballer for Adrigole, Beara and Cork
Kevin O'Sullivan (journalist) (born c. 1960), editor of The Irish Times
Kevin O'Sullivan (baseball) (born 1968), American college baseball coach and former player
Kevin O'Sullivan (Gaelic footballer) (born 1984), Irish Gaelic footballer for Ilen Rovers and Cork
Kevin O'Sullivan (skier), New Zealand Paralympian
Kevin O'Sullivan (hurler) (born 1971), Irish hurler
Kevin O'Sullivan (politician) (born 1953), American politician and non-profit executive
```

Return a more concise description. Aim for a single sentence, roughly 2 or 3 lines. 


=== RESULTS ===

Kevin O'Sullivan is a name associated with several individuals including an Irish Gaelic footballer, the editor of The Irish Times, an American college baseball coach, a New Zealand Paralympian skier, an Irish hurler, and an American politician.
